text: Oleg Dmitriyevich Baklanov (; March 17, 1932 – July 28, 2021Умер экс- руководитель ракетно-космической отрасли СССР Олег Бакланов ) was a Soviet politician and businessman. He was Minister of General Machine Building from 1983 until 1988. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Russian politicians Category:Politicians from Kharkiv
title: Oleg Baklanov
